title: Add support for MS-Logon UltraVNC
author: tjgng
body_snippet:
<!-- Feature Request -->
<!-- If you file a feature request, please delete the bug section -->
As per https://mremoteng.atlassian.net/browse/MR-328 it would be nice to be able to save and provide domain username and password to pass onto VNC.

iterations.description: MS-Logon authentication for UltraVNC is a legitimate feature request blocked by the VncSharp dependency, which needs to be replaced per #2025 before this can be implemented

comments.author: farosch
comments.snippet:
As commented on the linked thread in the first comment VncSharpNG does not support MS-Logon, thats why the username field is not visible.
We will have to get rid of VNCSharp before being able to implement this, so it depends on #2025

notes:
AI triage: MS-Logon authentication for UltraVNC is a legitimate feature request blocked by the VncSharp dependency, which needs to be replaced per #2025 before this can be implemented
Approach: Depends on #2025 (replace VncSharpNG with a VNC library that supports MS-Logon authentication). Once replaced, expose the Username field in the VNC connection properties UI and pass MS-Logon credentials to the new VNC library.
